about.name: The following questions are from real DMV written tests. These are some of the actual permit questions you will face in California. Each permit practice test question has three answer choices. Select one answer for each question and select "grade this section." You can find this button at the bottom of the drivers license quiz.  For a complete list of questions and answers for California please visit https://cheat-sheets.dmv-written-test.com/en/california/car.

hasPart.name: You may drive off of the paved roadway to pass another vehicle:

about.name: You may drive off of the paved roadway to pass another vehicle:

hasPart.assesses: You may drive off of the paved roadway to pass another vehicle: | You may drive off of the paved roadway to pass another vehicle: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: You may never drive off the paved or main-traveled portion of the road and onto the shoulder to pass another vehicle.

suggestedAnswer.text: If the shoulder is wide enough to accommodate your vehicle.

comment.text: If the shoulder is wide enough to accommodate your vehicle.

suggestedAnswer.text: If the vehicle ahead of you is turning left.

comment.text: If the vehicle ahead of you is turning left.
Under no circumstances.
Under no circumstances.

answerExplanation.text: You may never drive off the paved or main-traveled portion of the road and onto the shoulder to pass another vehicle.

hasPart.name: When being followed by a tailgater, which of the following will help you avoid being hit from behind?

about.name: When being followed by a tailgater, which of the following will help you avoid being hit from behind?

hasPart.assesses: When being followed by a tailgater, which of the following will help you avoid being hit from behind? | When being followed by a tailgater, which of the following will help you avoid being hit from behind? -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: When being closely followed by a tailgater, you should slow down gradually or merge into another lane to prevent a collision with them.

comment.text: Merging into another lane
Decreasing your following distance
Changing lanes frequently
Merging into another lane

answerExplanation.text: When being closely followed by a tailgater, you should slow down gradually or merge into another lane to prevent a collision with them.

comment.text: When being followed by a tailgater, which of the following will help you avoid being hit from behind? | When being closely followed by a tailgater, you should slow down gradually or merge into another lane to prevent a collision with them.

hasPart.name: You enter a designated turn lane to make a left turn at an upcoming intersection. There is oncoming traffic. You should:

about.name: You enter a designated turn lane to make a left turn at an upcoming intersection. There is oncoming traffic. You should:

hasPart.assesses: You enter a designated turn lane to make a left turn at an upcoming intersection. There is oncoming traffic. You should: | You enter a designated turn lane to make a left turn at an upcoming intersection. There is oncoming traffic. You should: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: When making a left turn, you should always begin signaling about 100 feet before the turn. You should keep your front wheels aiming straight ahead until it is safe to start your turn. This ensures that you will not be pushed into oncoming traffic if another vehicle hits you from behind.

suggestedAnswer.text: Move to the left of the center lane.

comment.text: Move to the left of the center lane.

suggestedAnswer.text: Signal before you arrive at the intersection.

comment.text: Signal before you arrive at the intersection.

suggestedAnswer.text: Turn your front wheels to the left to be prepared to turn.

comment.text: Turn your front wheels to the left to be prepared to turn.

acceptedAnswer.text: Signal before you arrive at the intersection.

comment.text: Signal before you arrive at the intersection.

answerExplanation.text: When making a left turn, you should always begin signaling about 100 feet before the turn. You should keep your front wheels aiming straight ahead until it is safe to start your turn. This ensures that you will not be pushed into oncoming traffic if another vehicle hits you from behind.

comment.text: You enter a designated turn lane to make a left turn at an upcoming intersection. There is oncoming traffic. You should: | When making a left turn, you should always begin signaling about 100 feet before the turn. You should keep your front wheels aiming straight ahead until it is safe to start your turn. This ensures that you will not be pushed into oncoming traffic if another vehicle hits you from behind.

hasPart.name: This white sign means:
hasPart.assesses: This white sign means: | This white sign means: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: A white, rectangular sign indicates that you must obey important rules. This sign means that drivers should allow the left lane to remain open, when possible, for passing and for faster traffic.

suggestedAnswer.text: You should slow down and move to the right lane.

comment.text: You should slow down and move to the right lane.

suggestedAnswer.text: Stay in the right lane if you are driving more slowly than other traffic.

comment.text: Stay in the right lane if you are driving more slowly than other traffic.

suggestedAnswer.text: Slower traffic must exit on the right.

comment.text: Slower traffic must exit on the right.

acceptedAnswer.text: Stay in the right lane if you are driving more slowly than other traffic.

comment.text: Stay in the right lane if you are driving more slowly than other traffic.

answerExplanation.text: A white, rectangular sign indicates that you must obey important rules. This sign means that drivers should allow the left lane to remain open, when possible, for passing and for faster traffic.

hasPart.name: It is dangerous to follow a motorcycle too closely because:

about.name: It is dangerous to follow a motorcycle too closely because:

hasPart.assesses: It is dangerous to follow a motorcycle too closely because: | It is dangerous to follow a motorcycle too closely because: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: Motorcycles can stop quickly and following them too closely endangers your life and that of the motorcyclist. If the motorcyclist makes a mistake, you need to have enough time and space to avoid a crash.

suggestedAnswer.text: They do not follow the same rules as motor vehicles.

comment.text: They do not follow the same rules as motor vehicles.

suggestedAnswer.text: A motorcycle can stop much faster than a standard vehicle.

comment.text: A motorcycle can stop much faster than a standard vehicle.

suggestedAnswer.text: They brake more slowly than motor vehicles.

comment.text: They brake more slowly than motor vehicles.

acceptedAnswer.text: A motorcycle can stop much faster than a standard vehicle.

comment.text: A motorcycle can stop much faster than a standard vehicle.

answerExplanation.text: Motorcycles can stop quickly and following them too closely endangers your life and that of the motorcyclist. If the motorcyclist makes a mistake, you need to have enough time and space to avoid a crash.

comment.text: It is dangerous to follow a motorcycle too closely because: | Motorcycles can stop quickly and following them too closely endangers your life and that of the motorcyclist. If the motorcyclist makes a mistake, you need to have enough time and space to avoid a crash.

hasPart.name: You see a flashing yellow traffic signal at an upcoming intersection. The flashing yellow light means:

about.name: You see a flashing yellow traffic signal at an upcoming intersection. The flashing yellow light means:

hasPart.assesses: You see a flashing yellow traffic signal at an upcoming intersection. The flashing yellow light means: | You see a flashing yellow traffic signal at an upcoming intersection. The flashing yellow light means: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: A flashing yellow traffic signal light warns you to proceed with caution. Slow down and be alert before entering the intersection. Yield to any pedestrians, bicyclists, or vehicles in the intersection.

suggestedAnswer.text: Stop before entering the intersection, as long as you can do so safely.

comment.text: Stop before entering the intersection, as long as you can do so safely.

suggestedAnswer.text: Stop. Yield to all cross traffic before crossing the intersection.

comment.text: Stop. Yield to all cross traffic before crossing the intersection.

suggestedAnswer.text: Slow down and cross the intersection carefully.

comment.text: Slow down and cross the intersection carefully.

acceptedAnswer.text: Slow down and cross the intersection carefully.

comment.text: Slow down and cross the intersection carefully.

answerExplanation.text: A flashing yellow traffic signal light warns you to proceed with caution. Slow down and be alert before entering the intersection. Yield to any pedestrians, bicyclists, or vehicles in the intersection.

comment.text: You see a flashing yellow traffic signal at an upcoming intersection. The flashing yellow light means: | A flashing yellow traffic signal light warns you to proceed with caution. Slow down and be alert before entering the intersection. Yield to any pedestrians, bicyclists, or vehicles in the intersection.
